Agi.desc: Light Fire damage to one enemy.

Agilao.desc: Heavy Fire damage to one enemy.

Aques.desc: Light Ice damage and inflicts Freeze to one enemy.

Auto Call.desc: Replaces an ally for another demon in the Devil Riser.

Big Wing.desc: Light Force damage and lowers Luck for one enemy.

Bomb Claw.desc: Medium Fire damage to one enemy and inflicts Bomb.

Bufu.desc: Light Ice damage to one enemy.

Bufula.desc: Heavy Ice damage to one enemy.

Burning Mite.desc: Medium Fire damage to one enemy and inflicts Bomb. Hits twice.

Call Attack.desc: Retreats for one turn and then returns to deal damage.

Cold Voice.desc: Light Ice damage and inflicts Mute to one enemy.

Countdown.desc: Inflicts Paralysis but raises one stats for one enemy.

Dark Flame.desc: Medium Fire damage to one enemy.

Dark Saber.desc: Medium Dark damage and inflicts Charm to one enemy.

Dark Spear.desc: Inflicts damage equal to 1/3 of the target's current HP.

Death Breath.desc: Heavy Dark damage and inflicts Charm to all enemies.

Dia.desc: Light HP recovery for one ally.

Diarahan.desc: Large HP recovery for one ally.

Diarama.desc: Medium HP recovery for one ally.

Divine Thrust.desc: Light Holy damage to one enemy.

Double Hit.desc: Light Dark damage to one enemy. Hits twice.

Double Vise.desc: Medium Fire damage to one enemy. Hits twice.

Earth Break.desc: Medium Earth damage and lowers Defense for one enemy.

Evil Eyes.desc: Light Dark damage and lowers Defense for all enemies. User recovers MP.

Feral Claw.desc: Light Holy damage to one enemy.

Fire Breath.desc: Light Fire damage to all enemies.

Freya.desc: Light Fire damage to one enemy.

Gaia Break.desc: Medium Earth damage and lowers Defense for all enemies.

Gaia Buster.desc: Light Earth damage to all enemies.

God Hand.desc: Heavy Holy damage to all enemies.

Grand Break.desc: Heavy Earth damage and lowers Defense for all enemies.

Guillotine Blade.desc: Light Dark damage and inflicts Charm to one enemy.

Hama.desc: Medium Holy damage to one enemy.

Hamaon.desc: Heavy Holy damage to one enemy.

Hell Thrust.desc: Medium Dark damage and inflicts Mute to one enemy. Ignores enemy's Guard.

Hellfire.desc: Light Fire damage to all enemies.

Ice Blade.desc: Medium Ice damage and inflicts Mute to one enemy.

Ice Breath.desc: Light Ice damage and inflicts Freeze to all enemies.

Icicle.desc: Heavy Ice damage and inflicts Freeze to one enemy.

Ill Omen.desc: Heavy Holy damage to all enemies.

Initalize.desc: Resets buffs and debuffs for all participants in battle.

Intense Freeze.desc: Heavy Ice damage and inflicts Mute to one enemy.

Iron-cutting Leaves.desc: Medium Force damage to one enemy.

Judgement Thunder.desc: Medium Elec damage and inflicts Paralysis to all enemies.

Killing Blow.desc: Earth damage to one enemy. Damage increases as user loses HP.

Last Blow.desc: Earth damage to all enemies. Damage increases as user loses HP.

Last Resort.desc: Damage equal to user's current HP to all enemies. Lowers user's HP to 1.

Life Drain.desc: Heavy Dark damage to one enemy. User recovers MP.

Light Blast.desc: Heavy Holy damage to all enemies.

Light Flare.desc: Medium Holy damage to one enemy.

Light Spear.desc: Heavy Holy damage to one enemy two times.

Lightning Thrust.desc: Light Elec damage and inflicts Shock to one enemy.

Mabufu.desc: Light Ice damage to all enemies.

Mabufudyne.desc: Heavy Ice damage to all enemies.

Mabufula.desc: Medium Ice damage to all enemies.

Magna.desc: Light Earth damage to one enemy.

Magnus.desc: Heavy Earth damage to one enemy.

Magukaja.desc: Increases Magical Defense for all allies.

Magunda.desc: Lowers Magical Defense for all enemies.

Mahama.desc: Heavy Holy damage to all enemies.

Makakaja.desc: Increases Magical Attack for all allies.

Makandyne.desc: Inflicts damage and lowers Magic Defense for one enemy.

Makarakarn.desc: Creates a barrier that reflects all spells.

Mamagna.desc: Light Earth damage to all enemies.

Mamagnadyne.desc: Heavy Earth damage to all enemies.

Mamagnus.desc: Medium Earth damage to all enemies.

Maragi.desc: Light Fire damage to all enemies.

Maragidyne.desc: Heavy Fire damage to all enemies.

Maragion.desc: Medium Fire damage to all enemies.

Marvelous Dance.desc: Inflicts Charm to one random enemy.

Mazan.desc: Light Force damage to all enemies.

Mazandyne.desc: Heavy Force damage to all enemies.

Mazanma.desc: Medium Force damage to all enemies.

Mazio.desc: Light Elec damage to all enemies.

Maziodyne.desc: Heavy Elec damage to all enemies.

Mazionga.desc: Medium Elec damage to all enemies.

Media.desc: Light HP recovery for all allies.

Mediarahan.desc: Large HP recovery for all allies.

Mediarama.desc: Medium HP recovery for all allies.

Mega Cyclone.desc: Medium Force damage and lowers Luck for one enemy.

Mitedyne.desc: Inflicts damage and Bomb on one enemy.

Mudo.desc: Medium Dark damage to one enemy.

Mudoon.desc: Heavy Dark damage to all enemies.

Myriad Hits.desc: Light Dark damage to one enemy. Hits three times.

Parala Eyes.desc: Medium Dark damage and inflicts Paralysis to one enemy.

Paraladyne.desc: Inflicts damage and Paralysis on one enemy.

Patradi.desc: Removes ailments and restores HP for one ally.

Poisdyne.desc: Inflicts damage and Poison on one enemy.

Poison Blade.desc: Medium Dark damage and inflicts Poison to one enemy.

Poison Breath.desc: Heavy Dark damage and inflicts Poison to all enemies.

Poison Claw.desc: Light Dark damage and inflicts Poison to one enemy.

Pulinpadyne.desc: Inflicts damage and Confusion on one enemy.

Quick Blade.desc: Dark damage and resets buffs for all enemies. Always goes first.

Quick Buster.desc: Medium Elec damage to one enemy. Always goes first.

Quick Spear.desc: Light Elec damage to one enemy. Always goes first.

Rakundyne.desc: Inflicts damage and lowers Defense for all enemies.

Rampage.desc: Medium Dark damage to one enemy. Hits four times.

Recarm.desc: Revives one ally with low HP.

Rock Fall.desc: Heavy Earth damage to one enemy.

Round Bite.desc: Light Dark damage to one enemy. Ignores enemy's Guard.

Saint Attack.desc: Heavy Holy damage to one enemy.

Samarecarm.desc: Revives one ally with full HP.

Skull Breaker.desc: Light Elec damage and inflicts Shock to all enemies.

Sonic Boom.desc: Light Force damage to all enemies.

Sonic Wing.desc: Light Force damage to all enemies.

Stun Shot.desc: Light Elec damage and inflicts Shock to one enemy.

Tackle.desc: Light Earth damage to one enemy.

Tarundyne.desc: Inflicts damage and lowers Attack for one enemy.

Tetrakarn.desc: Creates a barrier that reflects all skills.

Thor Hammer.desc: Medium Elec damage and inflicts Shock to one enemy.

Thunderbolt.desc: Light Elec damage and inflicts Shock to all enemies.

Trio The Punch.desc: Random Ice damage and inflicts Happy. Hits eight times (random enemies).

Triple Vise.desc: Heavy Fire damage to one enemy. Hits three times.

Wing Flap.desc: Light Force damage to one enemy.

Zan.desc: Light Force damage to one enemy.

Zanma.desc: Heavy Force damage to one enemy.

Zio.desc: Light Elec damage to one enemy.

Zionga.desc: Heavy Elec damage to one enemy.
